thread.title: Late 2015 Walt Disney World® Room Discounts
thread.title_full: Late 2015 Walt Disney World® Room Discounts

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Late 2015 Walt Disney World® Room Discounts
text:
Late 2015 Walt Disney World® Room Discounts Vacation Wishes Come True at the Walt Disney World ® Resort 
Why not make new family memories at “The Most Magical Place on Earth?” From thrilling twists and turns on the new Seven Dwarfs Mine Train at Magic Kingdom® Park to the great seasonal events like the Epcot® International Food & Wine Festival and Mickey’s Very Merry Christmas Party, your upcoming trip is a dream come true in the making! 
For a limited time, you can save up to 30% at select Walt Disney World® Resort hotels for stays most nights Aug. 15 – Nov. 24, 2015 and Nov. 28 – Dec. 23, 2015. Not only will you enjoy staying closer to the magic, your stay will also include an array of special Disney touches and magical extras that only on-property guests receive! 
Travel Dates: Save up to 30% most nights Aug. 15 – Oct. 3, 2015 (when booked before Aug. 7, 2015) Save up to 25% most nights Oct. 4 – Nov. 24 and Nov. 28 – Dec. 23, 2015 (when booked before Sep. 18, 2015) Contact your Magic Maker® today for pricing and availability! 
The number of rooms allocated for this offer is limited. Length-of-stay requirements may apply. Savings based on the non-discounted price for the same room. Everyone in the same room must be on the same package. Additional per-adult charges may apply if more than two adults per room at Disney Value, Moderate and Deluxe Resorts. Cannot be combined with any other discount or promotion. Advance reservations required. Offer excludes campsites, 3-bedroom villas, and other Resort/Room type combinations . 30% savings for select Disney Deluxe and Deluxe Villa Resorts; lower savings may be available for other Resorts.
